question.text: You want to park and you see this sign. On the days and times shown you should

explanation.text: Parking restrictions apply in a variety of places and situations. Make sure you know the rules and understand where and when restrictions apply. Controlled parking areas will be indicated by signs and road markings. Parking in the wrong place could cause an obstruction and danger to other traffic. It can also result in a fine.

answer.text: park in a bay and not pay
park on yellow lines and pay
park on yellow lines and not pay
park in a bay and pay
